desc: Helper functions (called from app.js and from routes)
name: functions

desc: Project file describing the license terms
name: LICENSE

desc: Application data/model (the 'M' in MVC); normally this would be in a database)
name: model

desc: Project file containing package, author, test, and other metadata info
name: package.json

desc: Mysterious npm-generated file that pollutes git commits
name: package-lock.json

desc: Images referred to by Markdown (i.e. README.md)
name: README.md-img

desc: Application view (the 'V' in MVC), EJS templates
name: views
